name: Hide Items
description: This Extension Hides Unnecessary Recommendation in Home Page

name: Seek Song
description: This Extension Seeks Song when you press 1 to 9 for 10 % to 90 % of the video and left arrow and right arrow Seeks backward/forward for 10 seconds

name: CSS Injector
description: This Extension Injects your custom CSS, snippets.

name: Skip or Play Liked Songs
description: This Extension Skips or Plays Liked Songs only
